| History                 = Vulpe Communications was a media company whose publisher [[David Herb (Earth-616)|Dave Herb]] was visited by [[John Jonah Jameson (Earth-616)|J. Jonah Jameson]] to convince him to publish a memoir written by him. During the meeting, the company's building was attacked by the symbiote-controlled [[Miles Morales (Earth-1610)|Spider-Man]] and [[Daniel Andrews (Earth-616)|Happy Dan Andrews]], who were after Jameson. Vulpe's security team, [[Silvija Sablinova (Earth-616)|Silver Sable]] and the [[Wild Pack (Earth-616)|Wild Pack]], arrived shortly afterwards to fend off the attackers.{{r|Absolute Carnage: Miles Morales Vol 1 2}}
